system.description:
At 3rd level you gain a reputation for a unique way to use magic in battle, your dramatic flair off the field, and your mystical talents. Choose one from the following options:

Choose one from the following options:

  • Flamboyance: Your flair for the dramatic grants you temporary benefits. Performing a trickshot, with a DC 13 attack roll, grants you expertise on your next Deception or Persuasion skill check.
    You may instead attempt a DC 17 trick shot to instead gain advantage.
    You may only gain advantage once during the encounter.
  • Quiet Observer: An uncomfortable silence and a piercing gaze can cut through difficult matters with ease.
    So long as you remain silent and do not attempt to use sign language to communicate during an encounter, you gain expertise on Intimidation and Persuasion checks.
  • Shrewd Accuracy: You’re well known for aiming true, even with people.
    You gain expertise on Perception checks made on a person’s appearance, and all Insight checks.
